can u squash em for me please? i checked that checkbox.
also are you sure about that:  EPOLLRDHUP fix? is that working for all platforms?
I am not sure about it, but it seems to work, and we'll replace that with libev at some point anyway, so right now I don't care much.

@iphydf funny that you call it insanely ugly :-) since those are your EXACT commands :-) (from jvm-toxcore-c repo). just not hidden in perl wrappers.
this way i find easier to understand and comprehend
jvm-toxcore-c scripts are also insanely ugly.
